actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend Chapter 39 of title 38, United States Code, to provide that beneficiaries of United States Government Life Insurance and National Service Life Insurance policies, who are 65 years of age or older, shall have the right to select options.

summary.text: Provides beneficiaries of United States Government Life Insurance and National Service Life Insurance policies who are 65 or older with the right to select certain payment options.

titles.title: A bill to amend Chapter 39 of title 38, United States Code, to provide that beneficiaries of United States Government Life Insurance and National Service Life Insurance policies, who are 65 years of age or older, shall have the right to select options.
